@OsloHimself Hello! Our hand luggage's size limit is 55x40x20cm, plus a 40x30x20  handback/backpack. Please know that with Megavolotea this luggage must be checked in, unless you also have priority boarding included. All the best! ✈

data.text: @zmrtbb @cant_infinita Hello! You may wirte to us through our contact form, which works as our email. It can be found here: https://t.co/L3ocQztkIy. All the best! ✈

@JesusPaoliniS Hello! Our apologies for this issue, we invite you to provide your booking number via DM so we may review the issue and inform of further steps. Thank you in advance and have a nice day! ✈
@PatatoOor Bonjour Patrick 😊 Une réponse a été envoyée à votre DM 📥

@nicolexcaba Hello! We are glad you were able to enjoy your flight with us. In relation to your bag, we invite you to provIde your booking number via DM so we may locate it :) All the best! ✈

urls.title: VOLOTEA | Reservations Center
urls.description: OFFICIAL WEBSITE OF VOLOTEA. Cheap flights and plane tickets to European cities. Online bookings. Direct flights, discounts, offers, families, groups. The airline for travel to European cities on direct flights at very competitive prices. We are creating new routes!

@xusko10 Buenas! Nos pueden contactar con el correo siguiente: press@volotea.com, ¡Atentamente!
@AurelienBrnrd Nous sommes sincèrement désolés de ne pas avoir été à la hauteur de vos attentes dans ces circonstances exceptionnelles et nous vous présentons nos plus sincères excuses.
@AurelienBrnrd Nous vous remercions de votre retour et sachez que nous restons à votre entière disposition à travers de tous nos canaux d'attention clientèle. Cordialement.
